document_data.name: Harangor Urlingscar
document_data.mainbody: High Crown '''Harangor Urlingscar''' was a [[dragonborn]] member of [[Clan Urlingscar]] and the king of [[Relmaur]] as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Background: Harangor was considered a stern man by most, but he also was a benevolent ruler. During his mandate, he allowed all the prominent Relmorn clans to participate in the government of Relmaur by establishing the [[Crown Council]].
